zh.app.title: 诺依曼趋势测试工具
zh.app.description: 用于评估数据集是否存在系统性趋势的统计工具
zh.menu.new_test: 运行新的诺依曼趋势测试
zh.input.data_points: 请输入数据点 (用空格分隔):
zh.input.time_points: 请输入时间点 (用空格分隔):
zh.input.exit_hint: 输入 'q' 或直接按回车退出
zh.excel.unsupported_format: 不支持的Excel格式，请转换为CSV
zh.excel.convert_suggestion: 请将文件转换为支持的格式（.xlsx 或 .csv）后重试
zh.excel.xls_convert_suggestion: 请将文件另存为新版Excel格式（.xlsx）或CSV格式
zh.excel.fallback_suggestion: 建议将Excel文件另存为CSV格式后重试
zh.tutorial.welcome: 欢迎使用诺依曼趋势测试教程
zh.tutorial.step2: 步骤2: 选择置信水平
zh.batch.select_directory: 请选择包含数据文件的目录:
zh.result.table_header: 数据点	时间点	PG值	W(P)阈值	趋势判断
zh.result.conclusion_trend: 数据存在显著趋势，可能表明测试样品在所测量的时间内存在系统性变化。
zh.result.conclusion_no_trend: 数据无显著趋势，测试样品在所测量的时间内保持稳定。
zh.result.test_failed: 测试未能成功完成，可能是因为数据点不足。
zh.result.trend_detected: 系统性趋势变化检测到
zh.result.pg_interpretation_trend: PG 折线图表示存在显著趋势
zh.result.pg_interpretation_stable: PG 折线图表示无显著趋势
zh.help.title: 帮助信息
zh.help.description: 诺依曼趋势测试是一种统计方法，用于评估数据集是否存在系统性趋势。
zh.help.usage_areas: 这种测试常用于药物稳定性研究和质量控制等领域。
zh.help.feature_basic_test_desc: 直接输入数据点并执行诺依曼趋势测试
zh.help.feature_batch_directory: 批量处理整个目录的数据文件
zh.help.feature_batch_files: 批量处理指定的文件列表
zh.help.feature_batch_export: 导出批量处理结果为CSV或HTML报告
zh.help.feature_svg_export: 导出高质量的SVG矢量图表
zh.help.feature_confidence: 可配置的置信度水平设置
zh.help.guide_1: 1. 选择'运行新的诺依曼趋势测试'直接输入数据进行测试
zh.help.guide_2: 2. 使用'从CSV导入数据'或'从Excel导入数据'导入外部数据文件
zh.help.guide_3: 3. 使用'批量处理'功能一次处理多个数据文件
zh.help.guide_4: 4. 在'高级功能'中查看数据可视化和统计分析
zh.help.guide_5: 5. 在'设置'中调整语言和置信度水平配置
zh.help.note_1: 诺依曼趋势测试至少需要4个数据点
zh.help.note_2: 标准Wp值基于特定的统计表，用于判断趋势是否显著
zh.help.note_3: 如果PG值小于或等于Wp值，则判断为存在趋势
zh.help.note_4: 默认使用95%置信水平，可在设置中手动调整
zh.help.note_5: 所有测试结果都会显示详细的统计信息和可视化图表
zh.help.tip_confidence: 右上角显示当前置信度水平，可在设置中修改
zh.help.tip_batch: 批量处理支持CSV和Excel文件，可导出详细报告
zh.help.tip_visualization: 测试结果自动显示ASCII图表，可导出SVG格式
zh.help.tip_export: 支持多种导出格式：数据集、图表、批量报告
zh.about.title: 关于
zh.about.description: 这是一个专业的诺依曼趋势测试工具，提供完整的统计分析功能。
zh.about.applications: 适用于药物稳定性研究、质量控制和数据趋势分析等领域。
zh.about.feature_batch: 批量数据处理和报告生成
zh.about.feature_visualization: 数据可视化和图表导出

en.app.title: Neumann Trend Test Tool
en.app.description: Statistical tool for evaluating systematic trends in datasets
en.input.data_points: Please enter data points (separated by spaces):
en.input.time_points: Please enter time points (separated by spaces):
en.input.exit_hint: Enter 'q' or press Enter to exit
en.excel.unsupported_format: Unsupported Excel format, please convert to CSV
en.excel.convert_suggestion: Please convert the file to a supported format (.xlsx or .csv) and try again
en.excel.xls_convert_suggestion: Please save the file as a new Excel format (.xlsx) or CSV format
en.excel.fallback_suggestion: Suggestion: Save the Excel file as CSV format and try again
en.tutorial.welcome: Welcome to Neumann Trend Test Tutorial
en.batch.select_directory: Please select directory containing data files:
en.result.table_header: Data Point	Time Point	PG Value	W(P) Threshold	Trend
en.result.conclusion_trend: The data shows significant trend, indicating possible systematic changes in the test sample over the measured time period.
en.result.conclusion_no_trend: The data shows no significant trend, indicating the test sample remains stable over the measured time period.
en.result.test_failed: Test could not be completed successfully, possibly due to insufficient data points.
en.result.pg_interpretation_stable: PG graph indicates no significant trend
en.help.title: Help
en.help.description: Neumann Trend Test is a statistical method used to evaluate whether a dataset has systematic trends.
en.help.usage_areas: This test is commonly used in pharmaceutical stability studies and quality control fields.
en.help.feature_basic_test_desc: Enter data points directly and perform Neumann Trend Test
en.help.feature_batch_directory: Batch process all data files in the directory
en.help.feature_batch_files: Batch process specified list of files
en.help.feature_batch_export: Export batch processing results as CSV or HTML report
en.help.guide_1: 1. Select 'Run New Neumann Trend Test' to enter data directly and perform the test
en.help.guide_2: 2. Use 'Import Data from CSV' or 'Import Data from Excel' to import external data files
en.help.guide_3: 3. Use 'Batch Processing' function to process multiple data files at once
en.help.guide_4: 4. View data visualization and statistics analysis in 'Advanced Features'
en.help.guide_5: 5. Adjust language and confidence level configuration in 'Settings'
en.help.note_1: Neumann Trend Test requires at least 4 data points
en.help.note_2: Standard Wp values are based on specific statistical tables for determining trend significance
en.help.note_3: If PG value is less than or equal to Wp value, a trend is determined to exist
en.help.note_4: Default uses 95% confidence level, can be manually adjusted
en.help.note_5: All test results will display detailed statistical information and visualization charts
en.help.tip_confidence: Display current confidence level in the upper right corner, can be modified in Settings
en.help.tip_batch: Batch processing supports CSV and Excel files, can export detailed reports
en.help.tip_visualization: Test results automatically display ASCII charts, can export SVG format
en.help.tip_export: Support multiple export formats: dataset, chart, batch report
en.about.title: About
en.about.description: This tool is used for performing Neumann Trend Tests, supporting data management, test execution, and result analysis.
en.about.applications: Widely applicable in pharmaceutical stability studies, quality control, and time series analysis fields.
en.about.feature_batch: Batch data processing and report generation
en.about.tech_formats: Support CSV, Excel and other data formats
en.load.run_test_prompt: Run Neumann Trend Test on this dataset?
en.test.change_in_settings: Can modify confidence level in settings menu
en.prompt.separator_help: Use spaces or commas as separators
en.prompt.timepoint_mismatch_warning: Warning: Time point count does not match data point count, default time points will be used.
en.help.show_help: Show this help message and exit
